text: let me introduce myself and my company my name is name and i am an accountant of teddy s r o hello my name is name and i am ceo of our company teddy s r o let me say something about us we distribute teddy bears from hundred to three hundred centimeters we offer classic teddy bears usa type of teddy bears and panda teddy bears we deliver every single order straight outside of the house of our customers within seven days we produce teddy bears in many colours so we have for example light brown dark brown and light so everybody can choose the type and the color what they like or what they want our company is the most productive at valentines day and christmas we think we have saved a lot of relationships and marriages our plush is delivered from tomlichtz a s which is the best supplier from out of all the country life is better with teddy bear so what dont have one at home this is all
